functions.name: concat
functions.description: concatenate a set of string

functions.name: endsWith
functions.description: Returns whether a string ends with another string.

functions.name: equals
functions.description: check if two strings are equal

functions.name: equalsIgnoreCase
functions.description: check if two strings are equal ignoring case

functions.name: contains
functions.description: check if str2 is within str1

functions.name: float
functions.description: convert the string to a float

functions.name: integer
functions.description: convert the string to an integer

functions.name: len
functions.description: get the length of a string

functions.name: substring
functions.description: get a substring from a string

functions.name: matchRegEx
functions.description: Match input against regular expression   string.matchRegEx("p([a-z]+)ch", "peach")

functions.name: replaceRegEx
functions.description: Replace data in a string based on a regular expression match   string.replaceRegEx("p([a-z]+)ches", " I hate peaches !", "apples")

functions.name: containsAny
functions.description: containsAny reports whether any Unicode code points in chars are within inputstring

functions.name: count
functions.description: Count counts the number of non-overlapping instances of substring in inputstring. If substring is an empty string, Count returns 1 + the number of Unicode code points in inputstring. string.count("cheese", "e")

functions.name: index
functions.description: Index returns the index of the first instance of substring in inputstring, or -1 if substring is not present in inputstring. string.index("cheese", "e")

functions.name: indexAny
functions.description: indexAny returns the index of the first instance of any Unicode code point from chars in inputstring, or -1 if no Unicode code point from chars is present in inputstring. string.indexAny("chicken", "aeiouy")

functions.name: join
functions.description: Converts an array to its string representation and concatenates its elements using the specified separator between each element

functions.name: lastIndex
functions.description: LastIndex returns the index of the last instance of substring in inputstring, or -1 if substring is not present in inputstring. string.lastIndex("go gopher", "go")

functions.name: repeat
functions.description: Repeat returns a new string consisting of count copies of the string s. string.repeat("na", 3)

functions.name: replace
functions.description: Replace returns a copy of inputstring with the first count non-overlapping instances of old replaced by new.  If count < 0, there is no limit on the number of replacements  string.replace("oink oink oink", "k", "ky", 2)

functions.name: replaceAll
functions.description: replaceAll returns a copy of inputstring with all non-overlapping instances of old replaced by new.  string.replaceAll("oink oink oink", "oink", "moo")

functions.name: toTitleCase
functions.description: returns the string to capitalize the first letter of every word

functions.name: toLower
functions.description: toLower returns a copy of inputstring with all Unicode letters mapped to their lower case.

functions.name: toUpper
functions.description: toUpper returns a copy of inputstring with all Unicode letters mapped to their upper case.

functions.name: trim
functions.description: Trim returns a slice of inputstring with all leading and trailing Unicode code points contained in cutset removed. string.trim("¡¡¡Hello, Gophers!!!", "!¡")

functions.name: trimLeft
functions.description: trimLeft returns a slice of inputstring with all leading Unicode code points contained in cutset removed. string.trimLeft("¡¡¡Hello, Gophers!!!", "!¡")

functions.name: trimRight
functions.description: trimRight returns a slice of inputstring with all trailing Unicode code points contained in cutset removed. string.trimRight("¡¡¡Hello, Gophers!!!", "!¡")

functions.name: trimPrefix
functions.description: trimPrefix returns inputstring without the provided leading prefix string. If inputstring doesn't start with prefix, it is returned unchanged. string.trimPrefix("¡¡¡Hello, Gophers!!!", "¡¡¡Hello")

functions.name: trimSuffix
functions.description: TrimSuffix returns inputstring without the provided trailing suffix string. If it doesn't end with suffix, it is returned unchanged. string.trimSuffix("¡¡¡Hello, Gophers!!!", "Gophers!!!")

functions.name: split
functions.description: Split slices s into all substrings separated by sep and returns a slice of the substrings between those separators. string.split("a,b,c", ",")

functions.name: startsWith
functions.description: Returns whether a string begins with another string.

functions.name: substringAfter
functions.description: Returns the string that follows after the first occurrence of the second string, or a zero length string if the first string does not contain the second string.

functions.name: substringBefore
functions.description: Returns the string that follows before the first occurrence of the second string, or a zero length string if the first string does not contain the second string.
